guidelines.title: Secure Coding Practices
guidelines.description: This guideline provides recommendations for secure coding practices.

controls.name: Use strong passwords
controls.description: Use passwords that are at least 12 characters long and include a mix of uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols.

controls.name: Validate user input
controls.description: Validate user input to prevent malicious code from being executed.

guidelines.title: Network Security
guidelines.description: This guideline provides recommendations for securing networks.

controls.name: Use a firewall
controls.description: Use a firewall to block unauthorized access to your network.

controls.name: Use intrusion detection and prevention systems
controls.description: Use intrusion detection and prevention systems to detect and block malicious activity on your network.
